Name: Doomsday Scavenger | 末日清道夫
About the game: Although I'm a girl, don't underestimate my shooting. The last pure land of mankind may depend on me to protect it. People call me 'Doomsday Scavenger'...... Background With the fall of the world, the living space of mankind was compressed to several islands. After years of operation, people finally connected several islands to form the doomsday community of mankind. Our heroine is a member of the guard army. She is responsible for cleaning up the fish in the street and some escort tasks every day. Journal mode [/] According to the content described in the diary, pick up the weapons in your hand and clean up the zombies on the road. A variety of zombie models can experience the pleasure of blood splashing and the stimulating head popping effect. The small map in the upper right corner can tell you the route and end point of this cleaning. With the advancement of diary content, the difficulty gradually increases. At present, there are five kinds of weapons, pistols, rifles, sniper rifles, rockets and grenades. Free mode [/] There is no bound map, all open, only one life. See how many zombies you can kill. After death, you will lose the weapons you have obtained and can only start again. Tips At present, it is a single player game, weak plot, only for shooting... From point a to point B, clean up the zombies on the road and transfer automatically. Because it is only a game played by one person, the optimization is not ideal. It may take a little time to load the scene first, and it will be much better later. I hope you don't mind.
